This activation token is invalid. Your e: This activation token is invalid. Your email address is probably already activated.
Your email address %s has been successfu: Your email address %s has been successfully activated!
settings / invite / logged-in / message: This link is an invitation for a new user. You're already logged into a Datawrapper account, so it's probably not meant for you. If you still want to accept this invitation with a new account, log out and open this link again.
settings / invite / expired / message: This link is invalid or has expired.
team / invite / intro: Welcome to Datawrapper! Please choose a password so you can log in to your new user account.
settings / invite / wrong-user / heading: This invite was meant for another account.
settings / invite / wrong-user / message: This invite was sent to %email%. To accept it, please log out, log in with that account and open the invitation link again.
settings / invite / not-logged-in / head: Please log in to accept the invitation.
settings / invite / not-logged-in / mess: This invite was sent to %email%. To accept it, please log in with that account and open the invitation link again.
controls / color-scale / type / help: Choose steps to show values within a range with the same color. Choose continuous to assign each value a color on a gradient.
controls / color-scale / breaks / help: Increase or decrease the number of steps, or change which colors are assigned to your values with the dropdown. Learn more in this Academy article.
controls / color-scale / interpolation /: The interpolation controls how the values are being assigned to colors on the continuous palette (gradient).
controls / custom-format / info: Learn more about custom number formats in this Academy article.
controls / custom-format / custom / numb: For help on custom formats, check the numeral.js documentation.
controls / custom-format / custom / date: For help on custom formats, check the moment.js documentation.
controls / gradient-editor / help: Click anywhere in the gradient to add new color stops. Click color stops to change color. Drag them up or down to delete.
controls / gradient-editor / import / te: Please enter some comma- or space-separated color codes:
controls / gradient-editor / export / te: Here are the colors for you to copy (ctrl+c)
controls / legend / offset / help: The offset setting allows you to move the map key from it's position towards the center of the chart/map area.
controls / tooltip-editor / help: Tooltips are little popup overlays that appear when a reader is moving their mouse or tapping on elements in your visualization. Click customize tooltips to replace the default tooltip. You can use HTML and other columns from your dataset.
controls / tooltip-editor / mini-help: You can use HTML and insert data columns. Using our formula syntax you can also perform calculations (see full syntax reference).
controls / tooltip-editor / err / not-de: is not available in the dataset
controls / tooltip-editor / sticky / hel: This option will make tooltips "sticky" after the user is clicking elements in the visualization. This is useful if you want to allow users to interact with the tooltip content, for instance to let them click on links.
controls / tooltip-editor / migrated: Heads up! We changed the syntax of the tooltip formulas. Please make sure your tooltips still look ok. Read more about what changed.
Both passwords must be the same.
The email is not registered yet.
The password reset email has already bee: The password reset email has already been sent. Please contact an administrator.
You haven't activated this email address: You haven't activated this email address yet, so we cannot safely send emails to it. Please contact an administrator.
signin / password-reset / success: You requested a reset of your password. You should soon receive an email with further instructions. If you don't receive an email within five minutes, please make sure to also check the spam folder.
signin / password-reset / error / token-: You already requested the password reset. If you didn't receive the email with further instructions within five minutes, please make sure to also check the spam folder, or contact our support for help.
signin / password-reset / error / email-: There is no user with this email address. Please check for typos.
Datawrapper: You requested a reset of yo: Datawrapper: You requested a reset of your password
You should soon receive an email with fu: You should soon receive an email with further instructions. If you don't receive an email within five minutes, please make sure to also check the spam folder.
You already resent the activation mail t: You already resent the activation mail three times, now. Please contact an administrator to proceed with your account activation.
Datawrapper: Please activate your email: Datawrapper: Please activate your email address
The activation email has been send to yo: The activation email has been send to your email address, again.

The password could not be changed becaus: The password could not be changed because your old password was not entered correctly.

To complete the change of your email add: To complete the change of your email address, you need to confirm that you have access to it. Therefor we sent an email with the confirmation link to your new address. Your new email will be set right after you clicked that link.
This just worked fine. Your profile has: This just worked fine. Your profile has been updated.

The password must not be empty.
The supplied token for password resettin: The supplied token for password resetting is invalid.
The page you are looking for could not b: The page you are looking for could not be found. Check the address bar to ensure your URL is spelled correctly. If all else fails, you can visit our home page at the link below.
Sorry, but it seems that the chart you w: Sorry, but it seems that the chart you want to see is not quite ready for the world, yet. Why don't you just relax and wait a minute?
Sorry, but it seems that the chart you want to see has already passed away because its author decided to delete it.
Whoops! You're not allowed to publish ch: Whoops! You're not allowed to publish charts, yet
Sorry, but it seems that your account is: Sorry, but it seems that your account is not ready to publish charts, yet.
If you created the chart as a guest, you: If you created the chart as a guest, you should sign up for a free account now. In case you already did that, you probably still need to activate you e-mail address by clicking on that activation link we sent you.
Whoops! We couldn't find that chart..
Whoops! That charts doesn't belong to yo: Whoops! That chart doesn't belong to you
Sorry, but the requested chart belongs t: Sorry, but the requested chart belongs to someone else.
Please check if you're logged in.
Whoops! You need to be logged in.
Good news is, sign up is free and takes: Good news is, sign up is free and takes less than 20 seconds.
You are not a member of the requested or: You are not a member of the requested organization.
If you think you should have access, ask: If you think you should have access, ask for an invitation.
You need to be signed in.
Guess what, in order to edit your user p: Guess what, in order to edit your user profile, you need to either login or create yourself an account.
The password reset link you entered is i: The password reset link you entered is invalid.
Re-check the link you received in our em: Re-check the link you received in our email. Make sure you copied the full link and try again.
Contact someone of our friendly <a href=: Contact someone of our friendly administrators and ask for help with the password reset process.
There is no user with the given user id.
account / password / strong-password-not: For security reasons we ask you to provide your current password. Please make sure you use a strong password.
account / password / current-password-no: For security reasons, please provide your current password.
account / password / mismatch: The password and the repeated password must not differ.
account / password / bad: Your password is very easy to guess. We strongly recommend you add more words or special characters to your password
account / password / weak: Your password is pretty easy to guess. We recommend you add more words or special characters to your password
account / password / ok: Your password is ok, but you could make it more secure by adding more words.
account / password / good: Good choice, your password is pretty hard to guess.
account / password / excellent: Excellent choice, your password is very secure!
account / delete / team-conflict: You currently have ownership of one or more teams. Please delete them or transfer team ownership to delete your account.
upload / not-happy:
Not happy with the new page? We'd love to know why!
You can switch to the old version here
describe / histogram / learn-more: The chart above shows how the values in the selected column are distributed. Learn more...
describe / info-table-header:
Click on table header
to edit column properties
describe / locale-select / body: Defines decimal and thousand separators as well as translation of month and weekday names.
publish / republish-intro: This chart has been published! If you make changes to the chart you will need to re-publish them.
publish / publish-intro: To share or embed your chart you need to publish it. It will only be visible to people who know the chart URL.
publish / publish-btn-intro: Click here if you want to embed your chart in your website or CMS.
publish / republish-alert: You have changed the chart after its last publication. To make these changes show up you will need to publish the chart again.
publish / progress / please-wait: Your chart is now being prepared for publication and should be ready in a few seconds.
publish / publish-success: Congratulations, your chart can now be shared and embedded on your site.
publish / help / share-url: The normal size URL displays the chart exactly the size you created it, and is useful for sharing on social media sites. The fullscreen URL will show your chart sized to fill the entire browser window.
publish / embed / help: Copy and paste this HTML code into your website or CMS to embed your chart. The responsive iframe automatically adjusts its height to fit both headline and chart on different devices.
publish / copy-success: Embed code was copied to clipboard!
publish / status / redirecting: Redirecting previous embed-codes to the recent version
publish / forbidden: Due to your team's settings, it is currently not possible for you to publish visualizations. Please contact a team administrator for help.
upload / drag-csv-here: Drag your CSV file here to upload...
upload / title: How do you want to upload your data?
upload / upload-failed: We're sorry, but we had trouble parsing your uploaded file.
upload / select sheet: The file you uploaded contains multiple sheets. Please select the one you want to import.
upload / parsing-xls: Hang in there! Parsing the spreadsheet may take a few seconds...
teams / reject-invitation / success: You successfully rejected the invitation to team "%s".
account / my-teams / why-teams: Teams can be used to collectively work on charts with other users. You can create as many teams as you want and invite other people to join them.
account / my-teams / no-teams-yet: You're not in any team, yet.
account / my-teams / your-teams: Here's the list of the teams you're in:
account / my-teams / leave-team / confir: Caution: After leaving this team you will lose access to the the team charts (including your own, which will get transferred to the team owner). To re-join the team later you wll have to get invited again. Do you really want to leave the team "%team%"?
account / my-teams / what-is-active: You can pick which team you want to be used as active team (indicated with ). Newly created charts will automatically be added to this team, and can also inherit settings from the team. If no team is selected, new charts will go to your My Charts folder.
account / my-teams / active-hint: Hint: you can also change the active team at any time using the    menu in the top navigation bar.
account / my-teams / leave-team / done: You have successfully left the team!
account / team-invite: You have been invited to join the team "%s". Click here to
team-create / p: Teams allow you to collaborate with multiple people on your charts, maps and tables. All team members will have access to the shared team archive. You can move charts between the team archive and your personal space using the Team Charts page. After creating your team, you can invite new and existing Datawrapper users to join it on the Team Settings page.
team-create / help: Choose the name your team will be displayed at. You can change this later.
team-create / slug-help: The ID will be used for internal Datawrapper team urls.
account / change-email / error / email-a: That email address is already being used by a different user.
account / change-email / error / invalid: The email address you entered is invalid. Please check that the spelling is correct.
teams / p: All members have access to the shared chart archive, and are able to edit each other's charts.
teams / name / help: This is how your team will be displayed in Datawrapper.
teams / invite-user / help: An invitation e-mail will be sent to this address.
teams / invite-user / invite / success: You just invited $1 as $2. They will find an email in their inbox.
teams / invite-user / invite / error / o: $1 could not be invited due to a server error. If the problem persists, please contact support@datawrapper.de.
teams / invite-user / add / error / othe: $1 could not be added due to a server error.
teams / invite-user / invite / error / 4: $1 could not be invited because they have already been invited to this team.
teams / invite-user / add / error / 400: $1 could not be added because they have already been added to this team.
teams / invite-user / invite / error / 4: Please activate your account in order to invite users to your team.
You have already sent $2 pending invites. Please wait until your invitations are accepted to invite more users, or reach out to support@datawrapper.de.
teams / role / p: Select the permission level you want to grant this user.
teams / roles / edit-charts: Create, view and edit team charts
teams / permissions / members: A team member can access the shared team archive and create new charts and maps themselves. They cannot access team settings, and cannot grant or remove access to other team members.
teams / permissions / admins: A team admin can access the team's archive as well as access team settings and grant or remove access to other team members.
teams / permissions / owners: The account owner can access the team's archive, team settings as well as view, change and update the subscription & billing options.
teams / defaults / p: Manage the display of your team in Datawrapper and set default settings for all newly created visualizations in your team.
teams / defaults / folder-status: Default folder status in "Team Charts" view
teams / defaults / theme / p: Select the layout that will be used for all newly created visualizations. Team members can still manually overwrite this for each individual chart.
teams / defaults / folder / p: Select where newly created visualizations are placed in the team archive. If no folder is selected, they will be placed in the root folder.
teams / defaults / folder-status / p: Select whether folders in the Team Charts view should be collapsed or expanded by default.
teams / defaults / locale / p: Select the number and date locale of all newly created visualizations.
teams / defaults / embedcode / p: Select the embed code that works best with your CMS, or create a custom one.
teams / custom / embedcode / help: You can use the placeholders %chart_url%, %chart_id%, %chart_width% and %chart_height% in your embed code template.
teams / delete / p: As the account owner, you have the ability to delete this team. If you delete this team, all members will lose their access. It's not possible to undo this. All charts from the team archive will be placed in the individual archive of the person who originally created the chart.
teams / delete / yes: Yes, I want to delete my team irrevocably.
teams / delete / really: You cannot undo this action. Please confirm that you are aware of this.
teams / delete / really-yes: Yes, I understand that I cannot undo this action.
teams / products / p: As a Datawrapper administrator, you can add and remove products to the organization.
teams / total / empty: This team has no members, yet
teams / charts-total-admin: with a total of %i% charts.
Yes, I really know what I'm doing: Yes, I really know what I'm doing
account / delete / really: Think about it one more time. Have you considered all the consequences of deleting your account?
You cannot login and logout anymore.
You cannot edit or remove your charts an: You cannot edit or remove your charts anymore.
account / delete / charts-stay-online: Note that this will only delete your account. Your charts will not be removed. If you want to remove your charts, please do it manually.
Please enter your password to confirm th: Please enter your password to confirm the deletion request:
account / delete / really-really: Do you still really want to delete your Datawrapper account?
Hi, good to see you. Now please pick a p: Hi, good to see you. Now please pick a password to complete the sign up.
account / invite / your-login-is: By the way, your login is %s.
For security reasons we ask you to provi: For security reasons we ask you to provide your current password. Please make sure you use a strong password.
For security reasons, please provide you: For security reasons, please provide your current password.
Congrats! Your password has been changed: Congrats! Your password has been changed.
account / change-login: Change the e-mail address or password you use to log into Datawrapper.
account / confirm-email-change: Please note that you'll have to confirm your new e-mail address again after changing it.
account / confirm-account-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account / confirm-account-deletion / fre: If you simply want to use Datawrapper for free, you can downgrade your account without deleting it. That way, you keep access to your chart
See how your account is doing.
Your account has been activated, and you: Your account has been activated, and you are able to create and publish charts.
Your account is pending because your ema: Your account is pending because your email address has not been activated, yet. You can create charts, but they will not be visible for anybody else.
Having trouble with the account activati: Having trouble with the account activation?
Filling out your profile is optional. If: Filling out your profile is optional. If you do, you can display these information below the charts you publish.
Your email address has been updated!: Your email address has been updated!
This is the email address which you use: This is the email address which you use as login and to which we send notification emails.
Name: Name
Add a website that contains more informa: Add a website that contains more information about you (e.g. your blog). Optionally you can display these information below you published charts.
Enter the link to your favorite social m: Enter the link to your favorite social media profile (e.g. Twitter).
Maybe the email has been catched by your: Maybe the email has been catched by your email providers spam filter. Please check the spam folder for the last activation email we sent on %DATE%.
Or, <a href='mailto:%support_email%'>con: Or, contact us to find other ways to activate your account.
account / password-reset / intro: Please choose a new strong password for your account.
Now please enter a new password.
account / pwd-too-short: The password must contain at least %num characters.
Congrats! Your password has been changed: Congrats! Your password has been changed. You can log in with your new password now.
controls / color / customize-colors / in: Please select an element on the left to change colors for individual elements...
controls / color-category / select-one-o: Select one or more items to set a color.
Please activate JavaScript to see the in: Please activate JavaScript to see the interactive chart.
This chart belongs to <a href='/admin/ch: This chart belongs to %email. Great power comes with great responsibility, so be careful with what you're doing!
Make sure the data looks right: Make sure the data looks right
describe / data-looks-right: Please make sure that Datawrapper interprets your data correctly. In the table number columns should be shown in blue, dates in green and text in black. A red cell indicates a problem in your dataset that needs to be fixed. â€“ cells contain no data.
Where did you get the data?: Where did you get the data?
Who published the data in the first plac: Who published the data in the first place?
If possible, please provide a link the s: If possible, please provide a link the source data
computed columns / modal / intro: The values for columns can be calculated using a formula, similar to Excel or LibreOffice.
computed columns / modal / add new note: Click "Add new" to add a new column
computed columns / modal / autocomplete: Hint: Use the Tab key to auto-complete column names
computed columns / modal / available col: Available columns (click to add them to the formula)
What do you want to do with this chart?: What do you want to do with this chart?
Congratulations, you created your first: Congratulations, you created your first chart!
Now, to be able to embed the chart, we a: Now, to be able to embed the chart, we ask you to create an account. It's free and all you need is a valid email address. The chart you just created will be transfered to your new account.
publish / export-duplicate / intro: You can duplicate it to start editing a copy of the chart. Or export it into other formats.
publish / unactivated / p: We've sent you a link to your chart via e-mail. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to get your chart. If you don't receive a mail within 15 minutes, please get in touch via support@datawrapper.de.
upload / try-beta: Curious to try new features? We are working on a new version of this page. Click here to activate it!
upload / headline: It all starts with your data...
upload / quick help: Select your data (including header row/column) in Excel or LibreOffice and paste it in the text field on the right. You can also upload a CSV or Excel file from your computer.
upload / learn more: Learn more about how to upload your data
upload / try a dataset: If you just want to try Datawrapper, hereâ€˜s a list of some example datasets you can use:
colorblind / info / deut: Deuteranopia is a form of red-green blindness (1% of males).
colorblind / info / prot: Protanopia is a form of red-green blindness (1% of males).
colorblind / info / trit: Tritanopia is a form of blue-yellow blindness (less than 1% affected).
colorblind / info / bw: Achromatopsia (total color blindness) is very rare. But for most accessibility "get it right in black and white" ðŸ™‚
visualize / transpose-hint: In case the visualization doesn't look like you expected, you should try to [LINK]transpose the data[/LINK]
Title: Title
Datawrapper is an open source tool helpi: Datawrapper is an open source tool helping everyone to create simple, correct and embeddable charts in minutes.
You are using a browser that is not supp: You are using a browser that is not supported at the moment. Please use one of the following browsers instead. Note that this only applies to the chart editor. The charts itself can be viewed with any major browser.
So, what can I do now?: So, what can I do now?

Looking for the old beta version of Datawrapper?

See what you created so far.
invite / h1 / chart: One more thing before you get your chart
invite / h1 / map: One more thing before you get your map
invite / h1 / edit: One more thing before you get your map
invite / h1 / table: One more thing before you get your table
invite / p: Quickly set up a password so you can access it again in future.
login / login / intro: We're glad to see you again. Login to access your charts, and create new ones.
login / signup / intro: Datawrapper lets you create and publish charts, maps & tables for free. Try out our tool without signing up or create an account in less than a minute.
login / alternative signin: Alternatively you can sign in via:
login / agree-terms: By using Datawrapper, you agree to our Terms of Use.
login / signup / confirmation-email: Thanks for signing up for Datawrapper! Please check your email inbox for our welcome email and click the activation link to complete signup.
login / signup / confirmation-email-hint: If you do not see an email within five minutes, please make sure to also check the spam folder in your email program.
signup / mobile / p1: Datawrapper lets you create and publish responsive charts, maps & tables for free.
signup / mobile / p2: While charts and maps created with Datawrapper are responsive, the editor is currently not intended to be used on mobile devices. Enter your e-mail address to receive a link to proceed on your desktop computer:
signup / mobile / back: Alternatively, click here to login or sign up directly.
Watch out: Your chart needs more space. To get rid of the scrollbars just [resize iFrame to chart]
Your changes have been saved. In the [Ch: Your changes have been saved. In the [Check & Describe] step you can restore the original dataset using the revert button.
Why not <a href='/chart/create'>create a: Why not create a new chart now?
mycharts / confirm-chart-delete: Do you really want to delete the chart? Note that after deleting this chart won't be embeddable any more.
mycharts / move-prohibited-alert: A folder can not be moved into its current parent folder, itself, or one of its own subfolders.
mycharts / confirm-move-chart-to-user: After moving a chart to your user folder, members of your team won't be able to access it anymore.
mycharts / confirm-move-chart-to-org: After moving the chart, all team members of %s can access the chart.
mycharts / confirm-move-folder-to-user: After moving this folder to your user folder, your team members won't be able to access the charts in it anymore.
mycharts / confirm-move-folder-to-org: After moving the folder, all team members of %s can access the charts in it.
mycharts / create-chart-here: Create a new chart, map or table in this folder.
mycharts / empty-folder: Nothing here yet, would you like to create a chart, map or table?
mycharts / welcome-folders: Now you can organize your charts in folders. Click on "create subfolder" to get started. Then you can drag your charts into folders.
mycharts / intro / folders / p: You can use this page to organize your charts into folders. Click on "Add subfolder" and drag a chart into it.
mycharts / intro / teams / p: To work on your charts with other users, you can create a team, move charts and maps into it and invite other Datawrapper users. Learn more about teams.
teams / remove / alert: Are you sure you want to remove this user's access to your team? If you remove a user, their charts will remain available for the team, though the removed user will no longer have access.
publish / pending-activation / p: We've send you a link to your chart via e-mail. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to get your chart. If you don't receive a mail within 15 minutes, please get in touch via support@datawrapper.de.
publish / pending-activation / resend-su: Your activation e-mail has been re-sent.
publish / pending-activation / resend-er: Your activation e-mail has already been re-sent multiple times. Please contact suppport to activate your account.
publish / guest / h1: Create an account to publish your chart
publish / guest / p: Enter your e-mail address to create an account and publish your charrt.
cc / formula / error / member-access: Access to object methods is not permitted
cc / formula / hint / insert-data: It looks like you were trying to paste data rows into the formula. Do you want to
cc / formula / help: Here you can perform calculations on the data you uploaded, e.g. for computing sums or changing texts. Find out how the formulas work
cc / formula / hint / equal-sign: Hint: Your formula doesn't need to start with <tt>=</tt>.
cc / formula / did-you-know / text: Heads up: Added columns now use a simpler, spreadsheet-like formula syntax (instead of JavaScript).
cc / formula / did-you-know / link: You can find more information and examples in our
controls / color-scale / custom-breaks /: The custom class limits must be in ascending order and may not exceed the value range of your dataset (%min - %max).
controls / color-scale / pretty-note: Rounded breaks aren't available for every step count. Try increasing/decreasing the count until the map changes.
controls / color-scale / custom-range /: You can use a custom range if you want to "fix" the color palette to a certain value range. This can be useful for dealing with outliers, to set a center for a diverging palette, or if you're using external data sources.
controls / color-category / select-one-o: Select one or more items to set a color or change the label.
controls / legend / orientation / note-a: when placing the legend below or above the visualization.
controls / legend / edit-labels / mini-h: Click labels to edit, drag items to re-order
controls / legend / interactive / help: If enabled, readers can hover the legend to see corresponding elements in the visualization and vice versa.
